data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3025894,"name":"","username":"Cassie4575","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/cassie4575/{size}/148994_2.png","created_at":"2022-03-19T22:26:17.878Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe were testing our climber today with our limit switch and suddenly the climber motor stopped working. Our climber motor is a NEO and the motor controller for it is a SPARK MAX. The lights were completely out on the SPARK MAX itself. We checked the PDP port and there was power coming out of that and the breaker on the PDP was not the issue.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eDoes anyone have any suggestions on how to fix this? For now we are just switching to another SPARK MAX that we aren’t currently using but we’d love to get that one running again and prevent this issue in the future. We’ll be contacting REV on Monday to try to get some help from them
